meanings.definition: One of a set of hard, bonelike structures in the mouth used for biting and chewing food.
meanings.sent1: My tooth hurts when I eat ice cream.
meanings.sent2: The dentist checked my tooth for cavities.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bit my tongue because my tooth is sharp.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a tooth in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The lion's tooth was sharp and ready to tear into its prey.

meanings.definition: A projecting part on a gear or saw.
meanings.sent1: The tooth on the gear helps it turn smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to touch the sharp tooth on the saw.
meanings.sent3: The tooth on the gear looked like a tiny mountain.
meanings.sent4: The tooth of the saw cut through the wood effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Each tooth on the gear interlocks perfectly with the next.

meanings.definition: A small pointed part on the edge of a comb or similar tool.
meanings.sent1: She found a tooth missing from her hair comb.
meanings.sent2: The fine tooth on the comb helped detangle her hair.
meanings.sent3: The tooth on the comb looked like a tiny shark fin.
meanings.sent4: With each stroke, the tooth of the comb smoothed her hair.
meanings.sent5: The tooth on the edge of the tool caught and held the thread firmly.
